column4: Hi, I have an old pc where ubuntu 8.04 works perfectly. I have upgraded to 10.04 and I have also tried with live cd: when I login with a new user the upper and lower panel are empty and the panels do not reach the right part of the screen
I am getting crazy it is a very strange problem
it is strange because also with livecd it is the same so it is not a fault during installation or upgrade
I get an upper panel and a lower panel
Oh? Does hitting Alt+F2 give anything?
Wait wait - is this an issue for a single user or for all users?
in livecd it happens for live user
Oh... so not a config/permission issue :/
in the hard disk installation (started from 8.04 and now upgraded to 10.04)
it does it only for some users
the users that have personalized a lot the desktop works
users with standard theme do not work. I have created a new user and it does not work too
